alert.note: Alert for Garza; Kent (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 8:16PM CDT until April 25 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kent County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Garza County in northwestern Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Justiceburg, or 9 miles west of Lake Alan Henry, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lake Alan Henry and Justiceburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
